code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a male physical therapist aged 29 yrs presents with mild upset that coworkers deliberately try to be irritating because they are jealous, mild delusional thoughts and frantic speech and Mental Health. he is having symptoms 14-15 times a week, in spite of treatment. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking he is a heavy drinker o:Height 67 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 19 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.

content2.Unmatched: be irritating because they are jealous , mild

td.content: s:patient presents with 10 months history of mild upset that coworkers deliberately try to be irritating because they are jealous. he is a white male physical therapist aged 31 ys. he drinks alcohol heavily for the past 4 years he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking o:Height 67 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.

content2.Unmatched: be irritating because they are jealous
